docs.abstract: North Carolina Gov Pat McCrory concedes to rival Roy A Cooper in his bid for re-election; concession ends nearly one month of challenges made by McCrory in closely contested statewide races that enraged Democrats.

docs.snippet: The two groups are putting aside divisions to combat a wave of Islamophobia and anti-Semitism since Donald J. Trump’s election, and to resist whatever may come next....
docs.lead_paragraph: The two groups are putting aside divisions to combat a wave of Islamophobia and anti-Semitism since Donald J. Trump’s election, and to resist whatever may come next.
docs.abstract: American Muslims and Jews form new alliances after wave of hate crimes that followed election of Donald J Trump; groups like Sisterhood of Salaam Shalom and even Anti-Defamation League throw in their support of Muslim community, even going so far as to say they will register as Muslim if Trump and his advisers set up registry.

headline.main: Both Feeling Threatened, American Muslims and Jews Join Hands
